attributes.action: Include Transgender people in the Goods, Services and Facilities regulations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These regulations are being amended to include Gay, Bisexual and Lesbian people. There is no mention of Transgender people.This is an unacceptable omission and is descrimination against the Transgender community. Possibly contravening the Sex descrimination act.
